parameters: \C[3]There's a hole in the ceiling to insert something.
\C[3]The light bulb shines with gentle light.
\C[3]There's a light bulb that's not getting power
\C[3]The light bulb shines with gentle light.
\.\C[4](I could put this bath stopper on the scale.)
\.\C[3]Placed the Bath Stopper in the other scalepan.
\C[3]...There was the sound of movement in another room.
\.\C[4](I could put this bath stopper on the scale.)
\.\C[3]Placed the Bath Stopper in the other scalepan.
\C[3]...There was the sound of movement in another room.
\.\C[4](I'll pour the hot water on it.)
\.\C[3]The ice sculpture melted into a puddle.
\C[3]A sparkling mirror that just reflects me.
\.\C[4](Ah, my hair's a little messed up...)
\C[3]The mirror has droplets stuck to it,
so it only shows a blurry reflection of me.
\.\C[4](I guess I'll put the doll at a distance
so it reflects the whole body.)
\.\C[3]Placed the Sara Doll in front of the mirror.
\.\C[4](To reflect the same image in both mirrors,
I'd need either a twin, or a life-size doll
wasn't there the Kanna doll in that one room?)
\C[3]The mirror has droplets stuck to it,
so it only shows a blurry reflection of me.
\C[3]I stood in front of the mirror.
\.\C[4](Now everything in the room is symmetrical...)
\.\C[3]Something outside the room moved, making a loud sound.
\.\C[4](I suppose I have to solve the other puzzles
in this room, then do the mirror last.)
\C[3]The mirror has droplets stuck to it,
so it only shows a blurry reflection of me.
\C[3]A painting of a hand holding a gun.
\C[3]The place where the gun painting was hung.
\C[3]A painting of a hand holding a gun.
\.\C[4](There's a painting on the back, too.)
\C[3]A painting of a hand holding a gun.
\.\C[4](There's a painting on the front, too.)
\C[3]A painting of a hand holding a gun.
\C[3]There's space to hang something on the wall.
\C[4](There's a painting on the right side, so...)
\C[3]A painting of a man facing left.
\C[3]The man in the painting was shot.
\C[3]A painting of a hand holding a gun.
\.\C[4](There's a painting on the back, too.)
\C[3]A painting of a hand holding a gun.
\.\C[4](There's a painting on the front, too.)
\C[3]The place where the gun painting was hung.
\C[3]A painting of a hand holding a gun.
\C[3]A painting of a hand holding a gun.
\C[3]The blurry mirror only vaguely reflects me.
\.\C[4](I guess I'll put the doll at a distance
so it reflects the whole body.)
\.\C[3]Placed the Sara Doll in front of the mirror.
\.\C[4](To reflect the same image in both mirrors,
I'd need either a twin, or a life-size doll
wasn't there the Kanna doll in that one room?)
\C[3]The blurry mirror only vaguely reflects me.
\C[3]I stood in front of the mirror.
\.\C[4](Now everything in the room is symmetrical...)
\.\C[3]Something outside the room moved, making a loud sound.
\.\C[4](I suppose I have to solve the other puzzles
in this room, then do the mirror last.)
\C[3]The blurry mirror only vaguely reflects me.
\C[3]A spray bottle containing an unknown liquid.
\C[3]A note with some names, including Prof. Mishima.
There's also the name Alice Yabusame.
\C[3]A painting of a man in profile.
A weapon that fires bullets. Can be charged with
up to 9 bullets in its circular chamber.
\C[3]A tool for spraying the liquid inside.
Droplets of water stick to it.
\C[3]A light bulb for illuminating a room.
\C[3]A card with Keymaster written on it.
It reads: "This is a key to the exit.
You will die if someone learns of this card."
\C[3]A spray bottle containing an unknown liquid.
\C[3]A painting of someone holding a gun.
\C[3]A painting of someone holding a gun.
Has another painting on the back.
\C[3]A stopper at the bottom of the bath. Small and heavy.
\C[3]A doll that looks remarkably like me.
\C[3]A painting of a man shot to death.
